name: Type Crawl
description:
Type Crawl is a fantastic invention I came up with years ago (as of as early as right now). It's a simulation where you can type black words on a dark red screen, and when each word is finished, it will slowly float off towards the top of the window and away into nothing...

Yes, that's it. That's not useful at all!

Type Crawl is pretty useless, but it functions as a novelty and a brief toy for sure, and it's a notable part of the Hindbodes birth age of 2018, inseparable from the history of that period alongside Quik Game and Bunny Horrors. Would you like a screenshot?

That one is with the window border to show that it's not going to go into full screen and dominate your operating system navigating.

> Is that all though, Hindbodes? Is there really no secret at all hiding inside this application, knowing that you put weird secrets in just about every "game" you release?

...

Depending on circumstances, there might be a day when I create Type Crawl 2.0, knowing that as of 2020 and later I now have better coding skill and logical reasonings.
